name: Hungry...
description:
Use the arrow keys or WASD (or both at the same time) to navigate and progress through dialogue. Most everything you can interact with has two separate lines of dialogue. I made this during the Games Made Quick gamejam. I hope you get some small modicum of enjoyment out of it. Thank you for your time.

You play as a stray dog looking for food. What you find is your path to heroism... and food.
